org.wlf.filedownloader.db

接口 ContentDbDao

  • 所有超级接口:
    DatabaseCallback
    所有已知实现类:
    BaseContentDbDao, DownloadFileDao

    public interface ContentDbDao
extends DatabaseCallback
    the base dao that can use for ContentProvider and SQLiteOpenHelper
    可以通过ContentProvider和SQLiteOpenHelper操作数据库的Dao接口
    作者:
    wlf(Andy)

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      delete

      get id field name

      get table name

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.wlf.filedownloader.db.DatabaseCallback

        onCreate, onUpgrade

    • 方法详细资料

      • insert

        long insert(android.content.ContentValues values)
        insert
        参数:
        values - A set of column_name/value pairs to add to the database.
        返回:
        -1 means failed,otherwise return the row id

      • delete

        int delete(String selection,
         String[] selectionArgs)
        delete
        参数:
        selection - An optional restriction to apply to rows when deleting.
        selectionArgs - You may include ?s in selection, which will be replaced by the values from selectionArgs, in order that they appear in the selection. The values will be bound as Strings.
        返回:
        -1 means failed,The number of rows affected.

      • update

        int update(android.content.ContentValues values,
         String selection,
         String[] selectionArgs)
        update
        参数:
        values - A Bundle mapping from column names to new column values (NULL is a valid value).
        selection - An optional filter to match rows to update.
        selectionArgs - You may include ?s in selection, which will be replaced by the values from selectionArgs, in order that they appear in the selection. The values will be bound as Strings.
        返回:
        -1 means failed,the number of rows affected.

      • query

        android.database.Cursor query(String[] projection,
                            String selection,
                            String[] selectionArgs,
                            String sortOrder)
        query
        参数:
        projection - The list of columns to put into the cursor. If null all columns are included.
        selection - A selection criteria to apply when filtering rows. If null then all rows are included.
        selectionArgs - You may include ?s in selection, which will be replaced by the values from selectionArgs, in order that they appear in the selection. The values will be bound as Strings.
        sortOrder - How the rows in the cursor should be sorted. If null then the provider is free to define the sort order.
        返回:
        a Cursor or null.

      • getTableName

        String getTableName()
        get table name
        返回:
        table name

      • getTableIdFieldName

        String getTableIdFieldName()
        get id field name
        返回:
        id field name
